entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NAOT: Run-time `ISA.IsSupported` should be invariant #96963
  • [API Proposal]: Allow BinaryReader and BinaryWriter to read and write null strings #96959
  • runtimeconfig.json not found #96957
  • WASM UseAppHost=false but still host when I run #96955
  • docker: Error response from daemon: failed to create endpoint affectionate_thompson on network nat: Windows does not support host IP addresses in NAT settings. #96954
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #96953
  • [API Proposal]: Safe API for covariant cast of ReadOnlySpan<T> #96952

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Update `System.Memory` nuget package with `Span<T>.Sort` extensions #92081
  • [browser] Unnecessary browser and node calls breaking usage in restricted environments #91558
    Future
  • [browser][MT] deadlock while disposing JS object from suspended thread #88663
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] ThreadStartException in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests on WASM #93323
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JavasScript promise did not completed. #94253
    9.0.0
  • Vector128 invalid code generation with tiered compilation in Release #96381
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Hide CallerArgumentExpressionAttribute Parameters in Intellisense #72382
    Future
  • Plan to include Regex based Replace option in StringBuilder #62730
    Future
  • Decouple 'ILoggerFactory' and 'ILoggerProvider' from 'IDisposable' #45602
    Future
  • Add ArraySegmentPool #41240
    Future
  • Api proposal: BroadcastChannel<T> #31992
    Future
  • Modify System.Timers.Timer ctor to accept TimeSpan parameter #361
    Future
  • build mono failed "warning d9025 overriding '/EHa' with '/EHa-'" #96832
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_370233/DevDiv_370233/DevDiv_370233.cmd #96390
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add DOTNET_JitDisasmTier0 #96960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #96951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce process count for ETW manifest test #96950
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.216, windows: 120.0.6099.217 #96949
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • JitDump and other minor improvements #96933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Clear only necessary memory in SectionWriter.EmitSymbolReference #96956
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve TeddyHelper.RightShift helpers for ARM #96928
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [browser][debugger] fake bind_static_method #96899
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable the gshared-mrgctx mode by default. #96946
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Delete old DFS and dominator implementations #96927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix maintenance of `genReturnBB` pointer #96935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} path to SearchValues #96924
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Disable load/store vector APIs until Mono adds support for it #96944
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix assertion at BigInteger.TryParse(null, out _) #96930
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove more helper frames by converting methods to QCalls #96926
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSC : error CS8103: Combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit. in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Emit.UnitTests.csproj #71645
  • the analyzer shouldn't report issues about global suppression target format when `Scope = "namespaceanddescendants"` #71644
  • `EventHookupCommandHandler` stuck and hangs VS #71643
  • VerifyHashRDirective is failing consistently in CI. #71641
  • "Extract interface" generates invalid code for read-write properties #71640
    Backlog
  • Column "Make abstract" in "Extract Base Class" dialog is truncated or unusable in other languages #71639
    Backlog
  • Verbatim identifier prefix is displayed inconsistently in tooltips for anonymous types #71638
    Backlog
  • Delegates are not properly reformatted when converting property from expression body to block body #71637
    Backlog
  • Block syntax in expression-bodied method is not reformatted when refactoring implicitly converts it to block-bodied method #71636
    Backlog

Closed

  • Update code fix for SYSLIB1054 to use a collection expression #71647

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Make list a collection builder type #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Verify SyntaxList length in SyntaxNodeCache.TryGetNode() #71642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #71634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Harden some codepaths from producing null #71595
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to value-tasks in asset lookup #71360
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Clear [Documentation] For [Blazor Auto Mode ] #53367
  • Fast path Json Serialization sometimes not enabled #53366
  • Provide the ability to build static sites like Svelte, Hugo, or Gatsby #53365
  • Blazor WASM: parameterset called several times after navigation reuses querystring value from previous page #53364
  • Default Tagless Container Component #53363
  • EventCallback.Equals is not giving correct results #53361
  • Add bucket size hints to histograms #53359
  • Improve Kestrel metrics #53358
    9.0.0
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #53357
  • Error : Normalizing '_blazor' to ... in balzor .net 8 #53356
  • Blazor WebApp Wasm HttpClient Error Even on Prerendered False #53355
  • Upgrade The Base Package Of Microsoft Like Humanizer To Net8.0 #53354
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53353

Closed

  • QuickGrid Related Property #53344
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53351
  • Grafana dashboards by dotnetteam are not working without fixing metrics names #53322

PullRequests

Created

  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53362
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x

Updated

  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell is a biggest problem/bug in MAUI. #19887
  • Shell tab algnment as it is made for TabbedPage #19886
  • Implement invocation of IWindow.DisplayDensityChanged() on MACCATALYST #19884
  • [Switch] ThumbColor does not get set when Switch is toggled off #19883
  • [Grid] Using Grid.Resources e.g. for Buttons overwrites default Button styles #19882
  • Issue with File Upload Dialog in WebView Control After Upgrading to .NET 8 on macOS in .NET MAUI #19881
  • Issue with Frame Layout Causing Child AbsoluteLayout Rendering Problems, replace Frame with Grid works #19880

PullRequests

Updated

  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Advice on implementing change management on ef core entities #32818
  • Set context_info in ef core #32814

Closed

  • Please throw informative "attempt to write a readonly database" exception #32811

PullRequests

Created

  • Move all pruning code to the pruner and make it an immutable visitor #32817
  • Use table mappings for FromSql #32816
  • Make TableExpressionBase.Alias immutable #32815
  • Handle complex types in GetDatabaseValues #32813
  • Redo query column/table relationship without TableReferenceExpression #32812

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Don't discover DbFunctions when building ad-hoc model #32807
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
